item.description:
Hi All,

The first major half marathon of 2009 in New England is only 7 weeks away... all details and sign up on http://www.hyannismar...

There's also a marathon (2 laps of the half marathon course!) and a 10k.

I did the half last year and it was cold but a lot of fun..

We can work out any further details regarding carpooling nearer the time but I just wanted to give y'all a heads up!

Cheers, Martin

You're responsible for your own registration fees, safety etc. and for taking loads of photos to post on here and Facebook.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: And into 2009... Hyannis half marathon weekend
